profileAlternative.name: Vaidehi Deo
profileAlternative.headline: Full stack developer - Java/JS | Experienced in cloud computing | Seeking full-time opportunity!
profileAlternative.summary:
Actively seeking full-time opportunity in software development . I am passionate about developing highly scalable & distributed enterprise applications and learning about Cloud technologies.

With almost 5 years of industry experience, following are few of my strengths:
1. Experienced in full stack application design, development and testing
2. Ability to work in agile environment and believe in rapid software development and quality delivery.
3. Have good understanding of SOA, Web Services, REST API, and design patterns.

given.text:
I have worked with Vaidehi when she was creating IP delivery software for ARM products. I found her very focused and detail oriented. She will pay attention to all the feedback during the review session. She will make sure all the feedbacks are implemented in a timely manner.
Her understanding of software practices is excellent. I can totally rely on her for complex software tasks. See less

Vaidehi is model example of how to be a good citizen in our society without having to sacrifice career. Besides being a great technologist and productive engineer at Arm, Vaidehi also volunteers with Arm's community outreach group 'Team Arm'. She represents the best of Arm's corporate responsibility initiatives by volunteering personal time to help those in need in our community. It is a privilege for me to work with Vaidehi and to know that I have a colleague that cares so much about the community and world we live in. Thanks for your enthusiasm for technology and your passion for our society and our world. See less
